article_title: White House Wednesday, a conversation with Frank Turek, how to face your economic fears and ask the right questions
article_text:
Clinton emails: More trouble for Hillary Clinton over her use of an unsecured private email server.

Menendez: The Department of Justice claims it has disturbing new evidence in its case against New Jersey Democrat Senator Bob Menendez.

Obamacare: The Obama administration cannot force nuns to provide contraceptives to employees under the Affordable Care Act.

Courthouse attack: Investigators today are looking for a motive in a knife attack at a suburban Philadelphia courthouse.

West Coast: California has more problems than wildfires and drought; the state is sinking.

Business news: Wall Street’s roller coaster ride continued yesterday.

article_metadata.keywords: world magazine, christian world news magazine, christian views, christian perspectives, god's world magazine

og.description: Today’s news and a discussion about the latest from the 2016 campaign trail, plus: a conversation with author Frank Turek about atheists and whether they need God in order to make their case, commentary from author Austin Pryor on asking...

article_summary:
Business news: Wall Street’s roller coaster ride continued yesterday.
Clinton emails: More trouble for Hillary Clinton over her use of an unsecured private email server.
Courthouse attack: Investigators today are looking for a motive in a knife attack at a suburban Philadelphia courthouse.
Menendez: The Department of Justice claims it has disturbing new evidence in its case against New Jersey Democrat Senator Bob Menendez.
Obamacare: The Obama administration cannot force nuns to provide contraceptives to employees under the Affordable Care Act.
